com.github.triceo.splitlog.api

Interface Follower

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CommonFollower<Follower,LogWatch>, MessageConsumer<LogWatch>, MessageListener<LogWatch>, MessageMetricProducer<Follower>, MessageProducer<Follower>

    public interface Follower
extends CommonFollower<Follower,LogWatch>, MessageMetricProducer<Follower>
    On top of the CommonFollower's functions, this allows for merging followers.

    • Method Detail

      • getFollowed

        LogWatch getFollowed()
        Retrieve the log watch that is being followed.
        Returns:
        The LogWatch whose LogWatch.startFollowing() was called to obtain reference to this follower.

      • tag

        Message tag(String tagLine)
        Mark the current location in the tail by a custom message. In case the messages before and after the tag should be discarded in the future, the tag should still remain in place - this will give users the notification that some messages had been discarded. Please note that the current location is indicated by messages that are MessageDeliveryStatus.INCOMING. If a tag is placed after such message is created and the message only becomes MessageDeliveryStatus.ACCEPTED later, the tag will still follow.
        Parameters:
        tagLine - Text of the message.
        Returns:
        The tag message that was recorded.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - When already MessageConsumer.isStopped().
